City Council District B
=======================

![SMB_4667](http://www.levellandtexas.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6270)

Council Member Max Ledesma - District B
---------------------------------------

[councilb@levellandtexas.org](mailto:councilb@levellandtexas.org)
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Max Ledesma Served as councilman for District B from 2013 - 2021. He rejoined the council in 2023.
